title: Put in low priority queue?
body: I was in a queue, and our adc lulu didn't connect, and for some reason we did /remake, we ended the game, and I got put in low priority queue. I mean, I had CS, items, so I was in the game. Why did I get put in low priority queue for afk behavior if I wasn't afk? It says I was the leaver, but I wasn't I even started the AFK vote...

replies.body:
LPQ only show up on your account as a result of a *trend* of disconnecting from matches. The Remake system specifically works by marking any players who are *inactive* for 90+ seconds within the first 3 minutes. If anyone was marked, a remake becomes available at the 3:00 timestamp.

Check out our [Remake FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) for more details. Let me know if you have any questions.
